item.description:
Hello Coffee Talk,

We will do another coffee and movie event to see the movie "The Great Gatsby".  I am certain many, if not all of you, have read this book by F. Scott Fitzgerald.  With Leonardo Di Caprio as Gatsby, the movie has glitter, glamour, extravagance and Director Baz Lurhmann brings the story of this beautiful, intelligently written, F. Scott Fitzgerald's literary classic novel to life.

**Please note that I changed the location of the event so we can explore a Common Grounds in Branford, CT and also visit a new theater in the CT shoreline.

Coffee Location and Time: 4 pm - Common Grounds, Branford, CT This lovely place in the center of town in Branford,CT not only roasts their own coffee on premises but also has delicious desserts.

http://www.commongrounds.com/

www.commongrounds.com/

Movie Location and Time - Movie starts at 7:30pm but we will head over from the Common Ground to the theater at 6:30pm so we can get there a little early and make sure we get tickets since this is opening weekend.  The theater location is Regal Cinemas, Branford Stadium 12, Branford, CT

Not too far, a very short drive to the theater from the Common Ground.

Movie starts at 7:30pm but we will head over from Common Ground at 6:30pm to buy tickets.

Cheers,

Swadhi
item.how_to_find_us: In the coffee shop by the entrance...you will see me.
item.name: Coffee Talk: Common Grounds in Branford, & "The Great Gatsby"
